works.description:
This is for the music video of the song
Shayan Italia - REFLECTION which this website has illegally put live and is
causing much harm to my work and my company. I wish for this to be taken
down. I don't know how they have got this video but it is completely not
authorized nor do they have the permissions for the same. The video is
clearly titled with my name and it is wrong to have this up on the website.
The site has no mode of contact and I cannot get through to the
administrator team as everything ends up as a DEAD LINK when I click on it.
It's complete FRAUD.
